oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: More about what Dia!kwain's parents instructed him about the porcupine; children should not eat the things that are at the back of the porcupine's neck. 1) This story is found in Book V-6.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A note about the porcupine
